msContents.summary: This manuscript contains the complete text of the Kuṟuntokai.

lg.l: kaḻaṉi marattu C1 also supports this reading. viḷaintuku tīmpaḻam
kāntaḷ vēli yōṅkumalai naṉṉāṭṭuccelva ṉēpa vōkal varaimārpā
yoṇṭoṭi makaḷir vaṇṭa layaruntoṇṭi yaṉṉa veṉṉalan tantu

body.p:
etu:― talaimakaṉ ciṟaippuṟat
tāṉākat talaimakaḷ tōḻikkuc colluvāḷāyc colliyatu.
— kallāṭaṉār ―

lg.l: puṉkā lukāat tucciṉai yaṉṉa naḷikaṉi yutira
ḷurutteḻu vaṉamulai yoḷipeṟa veḻutiyatoyyil (toyyiṉ) mikutikāppō raṟitalu maṟiyātu
piṟi tāka L1, perumpiṟi tāta lataṉiṉu mañcutu
niṉṉūr neyta laṉaiyai yemperuma nīyemakkiṉṉā kiyapala ceyyiṉu

body.note: KT316 missing, all poems after misnumbered one down
body.p:
e-tu:― alar añci yāṟṟāḷ ākiya
talaimakaḷ talaivaṉ kēṭpāṉ ākat tōḻi
kkuk kūṟiyatu.
-tumpīmōci kīraṉ-

lg.l: nammaṉai maṭamaka ḷiṉṉa meṉmaiccāya laḷiya ḷeṉṉāy
kāṉa lavirum perunīrc cērppa ṉīppi ṉorunam
cuṇaṅkuñ cilatōṉ ṟiṉavē yaṇaṅkutaṟkiyāṉṟaṉ ṉaṟivalē tāṉaṟi yalaḷē
pūṭṭup porucā vumaṇa roḻukait tōṭunirait taṉṉai
pāmpu paiyavin tiṭiyoṭu mayaṅki yiṉituvīḻn taṉṟē

body.p:
etu:― viṉaimuṟṟi vanta talai
makaṉ tērppākaṉait talaiyaḷittatu―
―pēyaṉār―
